AddTags.name: AddTags
AddTags.description: Grants permission to add one or more tags to a trail, event data store, or channel, up to a limit of 50

CancelQuery.name: CancelQuery
CancelQuery.description: Grants permission to cancel a running query

CreateChannel.name: CreateChannel
CreateChannel.description: Grants permission to create a channel

CreateEventDataStore.name: CreateEventDataStore
CreateEventDataStore.description: Grants permission to create an event data store

CreateServiceLinkedChannel.name: CreateServiceLinkedChannel
CreateServiceLinkedChannel.description: Grants permission to create a service-linked channel that specifies the settings for delivery of log data to an AWS service

CreateTrail.name: CreateTrail
CreateTrail.description: Grants permission to create a trail that specifies the settings for delivery of log data to an Amazon S3 bucket

DeleteChannel.name: DeleteChannel
DeleteChannel.description: Grants permission to delete a channel

DeleteEventDataStore.name: DeleteEventDataStore
DeleteEventDataStore.description: Grants permission to delete an event data store

DeleteResourcePolicy.name: DeleteResourcePolicy
DeleteResourcePolicy.description: Grants permission to delete a resource policy from the provided resource

DeleteServiceLinkedChannel.name: DeleteServiceLinkedChannel
DeleteServiceLinkedChannel.description: Grants permission to delete a service-linked channel

DeleteTrail.name: DeleteTrail
DeleteTrail.description: Grants permission to delete a trail

DeregisterOrganizationDelegatedAdmin.name: DeregisterOrganizationDelegatedAdmin
DeregisterOrganizationDelegatedAdmin.description: Grants permission to deregister an AWS Organizations member account as a delegated administrator

DescribeQuery.name: DescribeQuery
DescribeQuery.description: Grants permission to list details for the query

DescribeTrails.name: DescribeTrails
DescribeTrails.description: Grants permission to list settings for the trails associated with the current region for your account

DisableFederation.name: DisableFederation
DisableFederation.description: Grants permission to disable federation of event data store data by using the AWS Glue Data Catalog

EnableFederation.name: EnableFederation
EnableFederation.description: Grants permission to enable federation of event data store data by using the AWS Glue Data Catalog

GenerateQuery.name: GenerateQuery
GenerateQuery.description: Grants permission to generate a query for a specified event data store using the CloudTrail Lake query generator

GetChannel.name: GetChannel
GetChannel.description: Grants permission to return information about a specific channel

GetEventDataStore.name: GetEventDataStore
GetEventDataStore.description: Grants permission to list settings for the event data store

GetEventDataStoreData.name: GetEventDataStoreData
GetEventDataStoreData.description: Grants permission to get data from an event data store by using the AWS Glue Data Catalog

GetEventSelectors.name: GetEventSelectors
GetEventSelectors.description: Grants permission to list settings for event selectors configured for a trail

GetImport.name: GetImport
GetImport.description: Grants permission to return information about a specific import

GetInsightSelectors.name: GetInsightSelectors
GetInsightSelectors.description: Grants permission to list CloudTrail Insights selectors that are configured for a trail or event data store

GetQueryResults.name: GetQueryResults
GetQueryResults.description: Grants permission to fetch results of a complete query

GetResourcePolicy.name: GetResourcePolicy
GetResourcePolicy.description: Grants permission to get the resource policy attached to the provided resource

GetServiceLinkedChannel.name: GetServiceLinkedChannel
GetServiceLinkedChannel.description: Grants permission to list settings for the service-linked channel

GetTrail.name: GetTrail
GetTrail.description: Grants permission to list settings for the trail

GetTrailStatus.name: GetTrailStatus
GetTrailStatus.description: Grants permission to retrieve a JSON-formatted list of information about the specified trail

ListChannels.name: ListChannels
ListChannels.description: Grants permission to list the channels in the current account, and their source names

ListEventDataStores.name: ListEventDataStores
ListEventDataStores.description: Grants permission to list event data stores associated with the current region for your account

ListImportFailures.name: ListImportFailures
ListImportFailures.description: Grants permission to return a list of failures for the specified import

ListImports.name: ListImports
ListImports.description: Grants permission to return information on all imports, or a select set of imports by ImportStatus or Destination

ListPublicKeys.name: ListPublicKeys
ListPublicKeys.description: Grants permission to list the public keys whose private keys were used to sign trail digest files within a specified time range

ListQueries.name: ListQueries
ListQueries.description: Grants permission to list queries associated with an event data store

ListServiceLinkedChannels.name: ListServiceLinkedChannels
ListServiceLinkedChannels.description: Grants permission to list service-linked channels associated with the current region for a specified account

ListTags.name: ListTags
ListTags.description: Grants permission to list the tags for trails, event data stores, or channels in the current region

ListTrails.name: ListTrails
ListTrails.description: Grants permission to list trails associated with the current region for your account

LookupEvents.name: LookupEvents
LookupEvents.description: Grants permission to look up and retrieve metric data for API activity events captured by CloudTrail that create, update, or delete resources in your account

PutEventSelectors.name: PutEventSelectors
PutEventSelectors.description: Grants permission to create and update event selectors for a trail

PutInsightSelectors.name: PutInsightSelectors
PutInsightSelectors.description: Grants permission to create and update CloudTrail Insights selectors for a trail or event data store

PutResourcePolicy.name: PutResourcePolicy
PutResourcePolicy.description: Grants permission to attach a resource policy to the provided resource

RegisterOrganizationDelegatedAdmin.name: RegisterOrganizationDelegatedAdmin
RegisterOrganizationDelegatedAdmin.description: Grants permission to register an AWS Organizations member account as a delegated administrator

RemoveTags.name: RemoveTags
RemoveTags.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a trail, event data store, or channel

RestoreEventDataStore.name: RestoreEventDataStore
RestoreEventDataStore.description: Grants permission to restore an event data store

StartEventDataStoreIngestion.name: StartEventDataStoreIngestion
StartEventDataStoreIngestion.description: Grants permission to start ingestion on an event data store

StartImport.name: StartImport
StartImport.description: Grants permission to start an import of logged trail events from a source S3 bucket to a destination event data store

StartLogging.name: StartLogging
StartLogging.description: Grants permission to start the recording of AWS API calls and log file delivery for a trail

StartQuery.name: StartQuery
StartQuery.description: Grants permission to start a new query on a specified event data store

StopEventDataStoreIngestion.name: StopEventDataStoreIngestion
StopEventDataStoreIngestion.description: Grants permission to stop ingestion on an event data store

StopImport.name: StopImport
StopImport.description: Grants permission to stop a specified import

StopLogging.name: StopLogging
StopLogging.description: Grants permission to stop the recording of AWS API calls and log file delivery for a trail

UpdateChannel.name: UpdateChannel
UpdateChannel.description: Grants permission to update a channel

UpdateEventDataStore.name: UpdateEventDataStore
UpdateEventDataStore.description: Grants permission to update an event data store

UpdateServiceLinkedChannel.name: UpdateServiceLinkedChannel
UpdateServiceLinkedChannel.description: Grants permission to update the service-linked channel settings for delivery of log data to an AWS service

UpdateTrail.name: UpdateTrail
UpdateTrail.description: Grants permission to update the settings that specify delivery of log files
